biography.summary: John Boozman is an American lawyer and politician serving as the United States Senator from Arkansas since 2011. He previously represented Arkansas in the U.S. House of Representatives from 2001 to 2011.

contact.office_address: 555 Dirksen Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510

timeline.event: Elected to the U.S. House of Representatives for Arkansas's 3rd district.
Became United States Senator from Arkansas.
Re-elected to the United States Senate.
